text: alahi bemi’iminani layi kegosachewi yehoneni፤ be’inerisu layi anik’ets’ochuni yemiyanebi፣ yemit’erachewimi፣ mets’ihafinina t’ibebini yemiyasitemirachewimi yehoneni meli’ikitenya bewisit’achewi belake gize፤ be’irigit’i legeselachewi፡፡ inerisumi keziya befiti begilits’i sihiteti wisit’i neberu፡፡
